import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Kit 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var grey=colors.grey;export default{borderColor:grey[300],borderWidth:{0:0,1:pxToRem(1),2:pxToRem(2),3:pxToRem(3),4:pxToRem(4),5:pxToRem(5)},borderRadius:{xs:pxToRem(1.6),sm:pxToRem(2),md:pxToRem(6),lg:pxToRem(8),xl:pxToRem(12),xxl:pxToRem(16),section:pxToRem(160)}};
